ModulePrefs.title: NAAP lab - Cosmic Distance Ladder Lab - Supernova Light Curve Fitting Explorer
ModulePrefs.author: Sten Govaerts
ModulePrefs.description: The NAAP Cosmic Distance Ladder lab introduces a few of the primary methods used by astronomers to determine astronomical distances. Parallax is introduced first, specroscopic parallax, main sequence fitting, variable stars, and supernova are all discussed.
